person.persName: Junius R. Ward (Son of Junius R. Ward, Washington County, MS)

body.p: Residence: Washington County, Mississippi. Born in Washington County, Mississippi, son of Junius R. Ward and Matilda Viley. During Civil War, enlisted in Company B, 2nd Kentucky Infantry Regiment, under Captain Breckinridge. Became a planter in Washington County, Mississippi shortly after returning from the war.

bibl.p: Biographical and Historical Memoirs of Mississippi. Vol. II (Chicago: The Goodspeed Publishing Company, 1891), 985.
